children.value: This is a React equivalent of Mapbox's

, which can
be used to render custom icons at specific locations on the map.
Performance notes: if a large number of markers are needed, it's generally favorable to cache the
nodes, so that we don't rerender them when the viewport changes.
// PureComponent ensures that the markers are only rerendered when data changes

properties.ariaLabel: code classlanguage textlatitudecode number required permalink
code classlanguage textlongitudecode number required permalink

children.value: Offset of the marker from the left in pixels, negative number indicates left.
Offset of the marker from the top in pixels, negative number indicates up.
Allows this marker component to be dragged around the map. (Use
to capture the final position and update
Called when a draggable marker starts being dragged.
- The geo coordinates where the drag started, as
Continuously called while a draggable marker is being dragged.
- The geo coordinates of the drag event, as
Called when a draggable marker is released at its final position. This is usually a good time to capture
- The geo coordinates where the drag ended, as
Stop propagation of mouse wheel event to the map component. Can be used to stop map from zooming when this component is scrolled.
Stop propagation of dragstart event to the map component. Can be used to stop map from panning when this component is dragged. Automatically true if
Stop propagation of click event to the map component. Can be used to stop map from calling the
callback when this component is clicked.
Stop propagation of dblclick event to the map component. Can be used to stop map from zooming when this component is double clicked.
Like its Mapbox counterpart, this control relies on the mapbox-gl stylesheet to work properly. Make sure to add the stylesheet to your page.
